thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: Alex J Cook
thread.title_full: AMOMA.com bewertet von Alex J Cook

author: Alex J Cook
title: Alex J Cook
text: I stayed in the Hampton by Hilton hotel in Birmingham unfortunately the stay was horrific. Contacted amona in regards the the refund I was advised I would get from the hotel. The company was very friendly polite and professional, exactly how customer service should be, I will definitely be using amona for any other future booking I make.
